name: Trello Board Management - Login, Board Creation, List and Card Management Flow
description: Verify user login, board creation, list creation, card management with labels, due dates, and checklist functionality
steps: Navigate to https://trello.com/login
Enter username 'inbaperson' in the email/username input field
Click the 'Continue' button to proceed to password entry
Enter password 'K7#mP9$vL2@xQ8!' in the password input field
Click the 'Log in' or 'Continue' button to authenticate
Verify successful login by checking for Trello dashboard or boards view
Click the 'Create new board' button or 'Create' menu option in the header
In the board title input field with placeholder 'Board title', enter 'QA Test Board'
Select a background color or image for the board from the available options
Click the 'Create' or 'Create board' button to finalize board creation
In the list name input field with placeholder 'Enter list title...', enter 'To Do'
Click the 'Add list' button to create the first list
In the 'To Do' list, click the 'Add a card' button with class 'js-add-card'
In the card title textarea, enter 'QA Test Task - Verify login flow'
Click the 'Add card' button or press Enter to create the card
Click on the card 'QA Test Task - Verify login flow' to open the card detail modal
Click the 'Labels' button in the right sidebar to open the labels menu
Select a label color (e.g., green) and optionally add label text 'High Priority'
Click the 'Due date' button in the right sidebar with class 'js-due-date'
Select the date February 15, 2026 from the calendar
Click the 'Save' button in the date picker to set the due date
Verify the due date 'Feb 15' appears in the card detail view
Click the 'Checklist' button in the right sidebar to add a checklist
In the checklist title input with placeholder 'Checklist', enter 'Test Steps'
Click the 'Add' button to create the checklist
Enter the first checklist item 'Verify login page loads' and press Enter
Add a second checklist item 'Enter valid credentials' and press Enter
Click the checkbox next to the first checklist item 'Verify login page loads'
Verify the item is marked as complete with a strikethrough and the progress shows '1/2'
In the comment textarea with placeholder 'Write a comment...', enter 'This task covers the login flow testing'
Click the 'Save' button to post the comment
Close the card detail modal by clicking the 'X' button or pressing Escape
Verify the card in the 'To Do' list displays the label, due date badge, and checklist progress
Drag the card from the 'To Do' list to create and move to the 'In Progress' list
Click the user profile icon in the top right corner
Click 'Log out' to sign out of Trello
Verify successful logout by checking the redirect to the login page
